title: Imran Khan (singer)
summary: Imran Khan (born 28 May 1984) is a Dutch-Pakistani  singer, songwriter. Khan sings in Punjabi and English. He first reached stardom in 2007 after the release of his first single "Ni Nachleh". Khan was signed to Prestige Records in late 2007, and released the single "Ni Nachleh" on the label. His second single, "Amplifier", was released on 13 July 2009. As of July 2022, his song "Satisfya" is his most viewed video with over 830 million views on YouTube. His debut 15-track album, Unforgettable, was released on 27 July 2009 via Prestige Records, produced by Eren E.
